title: The Universe and I: the future
creator_credit: Kentucky Educational Television and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: Presents an imaginary journey in which a young man learns about the universe and his place in it, including views of nebulae, black holes, binary stars and other phenomena.
